verbs.description: WASHINGTON - [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he is considering commuting the sentence of ex - Illinois Gov. Rod Blagojevich and pardoning Martha Stewart] . The comments came aboard Air Force One on Thursday after he announced on Twitter that he planned to pardon conservative commentator Dinesh D'Souza .
